title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Software engineer with over 7 years of experience in designing, building high peroformance full stack web appliations

achievements: Led a team of four developers in executing and delivering software solutions to enhance user experience on the LaCentrale website.
Collaborated closely with the product manager to conceptualize and implement user experience improvements.
Provided technical leadership in developing new user preference features and integrating CRM services for LaCentrale users.
Spearheaded the creation of a new user management system, serving over 3 million users across the LaCentrale and Caradisiac platforms.
Facilitated the migration of legacy PHP stacks to modern Node.js and React frameworks, improving system performance and maintainability.
Contributed to the optimization of the organization's JavaScript build system and the implementation of a micro-frontend architecture, enhancing overall development efficiency.
Implemented an audit log system for a web application using AWS, Lambda functions and DynamoDB
Refactored the cloud infrastructure code using Pulumi

sections.title: Amazon DX
achievements: Developed a web application for an at-home PCR COVID testing kit using React, TypeScript, GraphQL, AWS Lambda, and Amplify.
Built the application infrastructure with AWS CDK.
Evaluated and improved operational metrics as a member of the engineering excellence team.

sections.title: Intech
achievements: Developed, designed, and deployed a comprehensive automated accounting solution for the Turkish marketplace using Java, AWS CDK, S3, Amazon Kinesis, and SNS/SQS.
Enhanced the vendor central application to onboard vendors from the USA, China, Brazil, Mexico, and Thailand onto the Turkish marketplace's Vendor Central platform.
Migrated legacy data ingestion from Java gRPC to a REST API using Python and  FastAPI.
Transitioned the web application from Google Cloud Platform to an on-premise cloud solution with Kubernetes and MinIO.
Deployed applications on both GCP and Azure using Kubernetes.
Conducted load testing using K6.
Developed and designed REST API for banking middle-ware in Java
Wrote unit and integration tests
Developed, tested, and maintained a web application using Java Spring Boot for the backend and Angular for the frontend.
Enhanced database architecture for improved third-party data ingestion.
Implemented and improved the Gitlab CI/CD pipeline.
Designed a backend REST API solution using Kotlin and Spring Boot to create and manage internal vouchers within the Orange ecosystem.

education.title: Ecole des Mines d'Alès
education.description: Double diploma program student in Design and Management of Information Systems
